Di set up na step up. A real reach, dis film na some James Bond ish. And for quality; as far as Nollywood dey go, set up na top of di line. Sterling quality. na di best Nigerian film for ten years . . . True true, dis film bring back great memories and e give me deep thought. Dis na di best film for Nigeria in more dan ten years.
